abilities.title: Insightful
abilities.description: You are very good at understanding people, reading social cues, figuring out their intentions.

abilities.title: Persuasive
abilities.description: You are very good at convincing people. You can talk your way out of the most difficult situations, you can convince the guard that you totally have an invitation to this party.

spells.title: Charm Person
spells.description: The person regards you as their friend for 1 hour. When the spell ends, they know theyâ€™ve been charmed.

spells.title: Influence
spells.description: Speak to the person and influence their state of mind for the next hour. Choose one of the psychological effects (increased confidence, anxiety, euphoria, fear, paranoia, calm, irritability, etc).

magicItems.title: Sending Stones
magicItems.description: Magical walkie-talkie. Communicate telepathically within 300 meters of each other.

equipment.title: Dagger
equipment.description: A shiny steal dagger. Looks ready for violence.
